thread.title: Mary Ellen 'Mel' Spera
thread.title_full: Software Advice reviewed by Mary Ellen 'Mel' Spera

author: Mary Ellen 'Mel' Spera
title: Mary Ellen 'Mel' Spera
text: Michelle Bryant was extremely professional, courteous, and knowledgeable. She took extremely detailed notes that were correctly provided to the sales teams. The online resource center is an awesome fountain of information and advice too.
